title: ULQ2004ADRG4__TexasInstruments_945_componentsearchengine
description: Darlington transistor array with multiple channels
chunks:

---

|---------------|---------------|--------------------|
| ULN200xAD     | SOIC (16)     | 9.90mm × 3.91mm    |
| ULN200xAN     | PDIP (16)     | 19.30mm × 6.35mm   |
| ULN200xANS    | SOP (16)      | 10.30mm × 5.30mm   |
| ULN200xAPW    | TSSOP (16)    | 5.00mm × 4.40mm    |
| ULN2003ADYY   | SOT (16)      | 4.20mm × 2.00mm    |

## 4 Pin Configuration and Functions

---

| 1B   | 16 1C   |
|------|---------|
| 2B 2 | 15 2C   |
| 3B   | 14 3C   |
| 4B   | 13 4C   |
| 5B   | 12 5C   |
| 6B   | 11 6C   |
| 7B   | 10 7C   |
| E    | 9 COM   |

---
## Table 4-1. Pin Functions

---

| PIN   | PIN   | I/O (1)   | DESCRIPTION                                                           |
|-------|-------|-----------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------|
| NAME  | NO.   | I/O (1)   | DESCRIPTION                                                           |
| 1B    | 1     | O         | Channel 1 through 7 Darlington base input                             |
| 2B    | 2     | O         | Channel 1 through 7 Darlington base input                             |
| 3B    | 3     | O         | Channel 1 through 7 Darlington base input                             |
| 4B    | 4     | O         | Channel 1 through 7 Darlington base input                             |
| 5B    | 5     | O         | Channel 1 through 7 Darlington base input                             |
| 6B    | 6     | O         | Channel 1 through 7 Darlington base input                             |
| 7B    | 7     | O         | Channel 1 through 7 Darlington base input                             |
| 1C    | 16    |           | Channel 1 through 7 Darlington collector output                       |
| 2C    | 15    |           | Channel 1 through 7 Darlington collector output                       |
| 3C    | 14    |           | Channel 1 through 7 Darlington collector output                       |
| 4C    | 13    |           | Channel 1 through 7 Darlington collector output                       |
| 5C    | 12    |           | Channel 1 through 7 Darlington collector output                       |
| 6C    | 11    |           | Channel 1 through 7 Darlington collector output                       |
| 7C    | 10    |           | Channel 1 through 7 Darlington collector output                       |
| COM   | 9     | -         | Common cathode node for flyback diodes (required for inductive loads) |
| E     | 8     | -         | Common emitter shared by all channels (typically tied to ground)      |

| T J   | Operating virtual junction temperature                           | Operating virtual junction temperature                           |       | 150   | °C     |
|       | Lead temperature for 1.6 mm (1/16 inch) from case for 10 seconds | Lead temperature for 1.6 mm (1/16 inch) from case for 10 seconds |       | 260   | °C     |

## 8.2.1 Design Requirements

---

| DESIGN PARAMETER         | EXAMPLE VALUE               |
|--------------------------|-----------------------------|
| GPIO voltage             | 3.3 V or 5 V                |
| Coil supply voltage      | 12 V to 48 V                |
| Number of channels       | 7                           |
| Output current (R COIL ) | 20 mA to 300 mA per channel |
| Duty cycle               | 100%                        |

## Table 4-1. Pin Functions

---

| PIN   | PIN   | I/O (1)   | DESCRIPTION                                                           |
|-------|-------|-----------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------|
| NAME  | NO.   | I/O (1)   | DESCRIPTION                                                           |
| 1B    | 1     | O         | Channel 1 through 7 Darlington base input                             |
| 2B    | 2     | O         | Channel 1 through 7 Darlington base input                             |
| 3B    | 3     | O         | Channel 1 through 7 Darlington base input                             |
| 4B    | 4     | O         | Channel 1 through 7 Darlington base input                             |
| 5B    | 5     | O         | Channel 1 through 7 Darlington base input                             |
| 6B    | 6     | O         | Channel 1 through 7 Darlington base input                             |
| 7B    | 7     | O         | Channel 1 through 7 Darlington base input                             |
| 1C    | 16    |           | Channel 1 through 7 Darlington collector output                       |
| 2C    | 15    |           | Channel 1 through 7 Darlington collector output                       |
| 3C    | 14    |           | Channel 1 through 7 Darlington collector output                       |
| 4C    | 13    |           | Channel 1 through 7 Darlington collector output                       |
| 5C    | 12    |           | Channel 1 through 7 Darlington collector output                       |
| 6C    | 11    |           | Channel 1 through 7 Darlington collector output                       |
| 7C    | 10    |           | Channel 1 through 7 Darlington collector output                       |
| COM   | 9     | -         | Common cathode node for flyback diodes (required for inductive loads) |
| E     | 8     | -         | Common emitter shared by all channels (typically tied to ground)      |
